original_text: They kept looking for Jesus, and as they stood in the temple courts they asked one another, “What do you think? Isn’t he coming to the festival at all?”
korean_text: 그들이 예수를 찾으며 성전에 서서 서로 말하되 너희 생각에는 어떠하냐 그가 명절에 오지 아니하겠느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: as they stood in the temple courts
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 성전 뜰에 서 있을 때

sentences.original_text: Isn't he coming to the festival at all?
